steps.title: Draw one circle.
steps.content: Draw one circle. This will be the eye.

steps.title: Draw a small circle, about half the size of the other one.
steps.content: Draw a small circle, about half the size of the other one.

steps.title: Draw a horizontally straight line from the end of the nose to the eye.
steps.content: Draw a horizontally straight line from the end of the nose to the eye. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Draw another circle, the same size as the eye.
steps.content: Draw another circle, the same size as the eye. It must be exactly in line with it, horizontally. It must 'wrap' around the nose.

steps.title: Erase the parts that overlap the nose and the first eye, as the first eye should be more in the foreground.
steps.content: Erase the parts that overlap the nose and the first eye, as the first eye should be more in the foreground.

steps.title: Draw a curved line that stretches from the bottom point of the nose, to about in line with the far side of the first eye.
steps.content: Draw a curved line that stretches from the bottom point of the nose, to about in line with the far side of the first eye.

steps.title: Draw another curved line from the same point as the previous one, but pointing down, in a south-east direction.
steps.content: Draw another curved line from the same point as the previous one, but pointing down, in a south-east direction. Its length must be about the height of one of the eyes. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Draw another curved line from the finishing point of the last one, pointing slightly down.
steps.content: Draw another curved line from the finishing point of the last one, pointing slightly down. Its length will be the same as the vertical height of the nose.

steps.title: Draw a small curved line, slightly smaller than the last one, that goes from the finishing point of the last one, pointing south-west.
steps.content: Draw a small curved line, slightly smaller than the last one, that goes from the finishing point of the last one, pointing south-west.

steps.title: From the ending point of the line in Step 9, draw yet another curved line that points south-east, that is slightly longer than the vertical height of one of the eyes.
steps.content: From the ending point of the line in Step 9, draw yet another curved line that points south-east, that is slightly longer than the vertical height of one of the eyes.

steps.title: Draw a curved line from the point of the last one, to the point of the one in Step 12.
steps.content: Draw a curved line from the point of the last one, to the point of the one in Step 12.

steps.title: Add any expression of your choice to the mouth.
steps.content: Add any expression of your choice to the mouth.

steps.title: Draw a circle that is about the size of the curved part of Homer's skull (see picture above).
steps.content: Draw a circle that is about the size of the curved part of Homer's skull (see picture above). Chop off half to make it a semi-circle, but at an angle.

steps.title: Move the semicircle to a suitable point.
steps.content: Move the semicircle to a suitable point.

steps.title: Make a small lump above the second eye (see picture).
steps.content: Make a small lump above the second eye (see picture).

steps.title: Draw a straight line from the top of the lump, to the bottom of the semicircle.
steps.content: Draw a straight line from the top of the lump, to the bottom of the semicircle.

steps.title: Draw a curved line from the other point of the skull semicircle that stretches all the way down past the mouth.
steps.content: Draw a curved line from the other point of the skull semicircle that stretches all the way down past the mouth.

steps.title: Create a circle about half the size of the eye, and cut a small part off.
steps.content: Create a circle about half the size of the eye, and cut a small part off. This will be the ear.

steps.title: Draw the line that appears on homers ear(see picture).
steps.content: Draw the line that appears on homers ear(see picture).

steps.title: Add the two curved hairs at the top, and the other ones just above the ear.
steps.content: Add the two curved hairs at the top, and the other ones just above the ear.

steps.title: Add pupils to the eyes at any desired point.
steps.content: Add pupils to the eyes at any desired point.

steps.title: Fill the face and Homer's beard with appropriate colours.
steps.content: Fill the face and Homer's beard with appropriate colours. If the head is too big, you can rub out and make it smaller

steps.title: Draw 2 circles as eyes.
steps.content: Draw 2 circles as eyes. Place two dots for the pupils in both circles.

steps.title: Draw the nose shaped as a sausage under the eyes.
steps.content: Draw the nose shaped as a sausage under the eyes.

steps.title: Draw a bow that is pointing to the left for the first part for the mouth.
steps.content: Draw a bow that is pointing to the left for the first part for the mouth.

steps.title: Draw another bow that is pointed to the right and is connected to the other bow.
steps.content: Draw another bow that is pointed to the right and is connected to the other bow.

steps.title: Draw Homer's head above his eyes.
steps.content: Draw Homer's head above his eyes.

steps.title: Draw his hair making 4 half circles.
steps.content: Draw his hair making 4 half circles.

steps.title: Draw Homer's neck and ear, for the ear you can simply draw a half of a small circle.
steps.content: Draw Homer's neck and ear, for the ear you can simply draw a half of a small circle.

steps.title: Draw the collar right under his neck.
steps.content: Draw the collar right under his neck.

steps.title: Draw under the collar Homer's tummy.
steps.content: Draw under the collar Homer's tummy.

steps.title: Draw the 2 sleeves from his shirt.
steps.content: Draw the 2 sleeves from his shirt.

steps.title: Draw under his sleeve his arm with the hand.
steps.content: Draw under his sleeve his arm with the hand.

steps.title: Draw the start of his pants and legs.
steps.content: Draw the start of his pants and legs.

steps.title: Draw his leg and shoe under his visible arm.
steps.content: Draw his leg and shoe under his visible arm.

steps.title: Draw his other leg and shoe next to the other one.
steps.content: Draw his other leg and shoe next to the other one.
